sentences.english: Nine patients with normal motor power and 9 patients with paraplegia were studied.

sentences.english: Objective: To explore the experiences of perioperative nursing to the patients of thoracic and lumbar vertebra fracture combination with paralysis.

sentences.english: The bedsore is also one of paraplegia common complications.

sentences.english: Muscle spasticity is one of the common complications in the paraplegic patients who suffer from spinal cord injury (SCI).
